Release LTS.471.9 of November 18, 2025
New features
The ability to create user tasks outside of business process contexts was added: it is now possible to manually create a task and assign it to a specific assignee.
The button settings and the name of the modal window were updated when creating a new object.
ETL processes were stabilized and optimized: they now operate without a persistent technical connection to the database, which eliminates timeout issues and saves database resources.
To facilitate working with large volumes of data change information in the System, reports based on
audit
data were configured.
The user data synchronization process was optimized: it is now possible to disable synchronization for each data provider individually via
configuration file parameters
.
The administrators can now manage permissions for actions of individual meeting participants.
The option to view connection parameters was added to the meeting window.
A "Raise hand" feature was implemented, allowing users to signal the meeting organizer when they want to ask a question or speak.
Changes and improvements
The display of the
questionnaire
title upon first system login was adjusted.
The display of the success message upon data saving when creating an instance in a child attribute was debugged.
A check for
attribute settings
consistency was added: it is now impossible to create a mandatory attribute without specifying a default value for existing objects.
The process of creating instances in a
primitive object type
(or child type) registry was stabilized.
The logic for changing the order of objects in a child attribute was improved.
The filtering of values for the object attribute with multiple selection was debugged.
Subject area elements found via search are now highlighted in light blue instead of yellow.
The deletion of objects in the registry edit mode with multiple selection was debugged.
The display of the object filtering modal window in the registry was adjusted.
The opening of the specified object registry was stabilized when selecting an instance in an object attribute with the active "Select object via pop-up window"
option
, and the display of the selected value was debugged.
The display of the file signing indicator was debugged in a "File" type attribute with the
"File attachment visual for signing"
visual.
The functionality of the styling algorithm for chained attribute values was restored.
The functionality of custom actions via the button placed on the visual using the frame was set up.
The functionality of expressions when making changes to an attribute in the tile registry, displayed on the visual through the frame, was debugged.
The functionality of the styling algorithm for tab names was restored.
Saving the business process schema when adding/removing elements was stabilized.
The operation of the
"Table"
dashboard with pinned columns and configured grouping was stabilized.
The position of the checkbox for multiple object selection in the
"Table"
analytical panel was adjusted.
The display of the selected value in the
"Control element"
analytical panel was stabilized.
Data grouping by series was restored when building a
structural diagram
with the active "More than one data series" option.
The operation of a
batch action
placed on a
primitive object with a surrogate key
visual was debugged.
Adding a new condition when configuring filtering based on a
condition tree
was debugged.
The ability to sign files in the
"Explorer"
widget was debugged.
Working with signed files was stabilized.
HTML layout is now preserved correctly when sending individual emails to each user, ensuring consistent email display for all recipients.
Adding related objects to an
update
file containing an algorithm was debugged.
ETL migration via GUF file was debugged.
Password masking during user migration using an
update
was added.
The transfer of attributes using GUF files was stabilized.
Displaying a record for a failed object creation attempt was adjusted in the
audit of actions
.
A vulnerability in light registry column names was eliminated.
Working with bookmarks in a document associated with multiple questionnaire elements was debugged.
Collaborative work with numbered lists was stabilized.
The processing of numerical data and dates in document text was improved when comparing document versions.
Working with bookmarks in document version comparison mode was debugged.
The display of questionnaire element values was stabilized when updating values from a data source.
Exporting a document file from an object profile was debugged.
When hiding a questionnaire item, all associated comments are now automatically deleted.
The display of comparison results between the document version and standard formulations was set up.
The performance was optimized when changing a text attribute with manual adjustments in the questionnaire.
The creation of a document version from a file with locks was debugged.
The document preview in *.docx format was stabilized.
The functionality of the visibility algorithms for elements in the document was debugged.
The display of links during document export in *.xlsx format was set up.
When a user is blocked during a substitution period (vacation, sick leave), the system now also suspends sending push notifications to them.
